name: Space X8 PB
description:
Shoot the targets while manipulating a chaotic alphabetical turret! Submission for MiniJam 74.

Controls

Space: Hold to reverse the rotational direction

X, P, B: Press to change the turret to the shape of either X, P or B. Press the same key of the current shape to move or stop moving the turret.

8: Turn the turret's movement track 90 degrees.

Credits

Programming: slothropbodine, floorwalker2

Art: floorwalker2
